subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A. quarterback Ben Olson broke his foot and will be sidelined for at least two months. Olson, whose career has been marked by injuries, broke the fifth metatarsal in his right foot during practice Saturday, and X-rays taken Sunday revealed the fracture.
